articles.content:
Oklahoma gymnast Maggie Nichols, a junior from Little Canada, won the all-around for the second straight year in the NCAA championships on Friday night in Fort Worth, Texas. Her score was 39.7125.
Nichols was competing in floor exercise (9.925) and all-aroun… [+2702 chars]

articles.title: How the path from the Triangle to the NBA detoured through New Hampshire
articles.description: Several Triangle basketball playerom the Garner Road AAU program have finished their prep careers at Brewster Academy in New Hampshire before going on to Division I and NBA success.
articles.content:

articles.title: Nebraska's annual Lymphoma Walk to be held April 27
articles.description: On Saturday, April 27, Nebraska’s 10th annual Lymphoma Walk will be held at Mahoney State Park. The fundraising event will begin at 10 a. m. with registration at 9 a. m. at the park pavilion. Mahoney State Park is located just off I-80 at exit 426, betw…

articles.title: Early Saturday AM April 20th - Nice Easter holiday weekend underway
articles.description: We'll stay quiet as the warming trend continues for the rest of the weekend. We will certainly enjoy it before t-storm chances return next week...
articles.content: JOPLIN, Mo. - Good early Saturday morning, everyone. Hopefully, you all had a great start to the weekend. Despite temperatures below normal yesterday, we had a quiet Friday across the area. I'd say it's well deserved after dealing with severe weather late Wed… [+4919 chars]
